content: °वृत्ति <ls n="Dk.">21</ls>; the interior. {2} an intimate friend, near or confidential person (forming, as it were, part of oneself); मदंतरंगभूतां <ls>Dk. 81</ls>, <ls n="Dk.">93</ls>, <ls n="Dk.">101</ls>; राजांतरंगभावेन <ls n="Dk.">135</ls>; अंतरंगेषु राज्यभारं समर्प्य <ls n="Dk.">159.</ls> {3} an essential or indispensable part, as श्रवण, मनन & निदिध्यासन in realizing Brahma.
